thread.title: George Clooney Was Not At This Awards Show
thread.title_full: George Clooney Was Not At This Awards Show

title: George Clooney Was Not At This Awards Show
text:
Get Business & Technology Alerts 
28 Sep 2015 02:50 AM EST 
The Proto Awards, the self-proclaimed "Oscars of the Virtual Reality industry," was not a black tie affair. Not that some guests weren't wearing black ties. It's just that the dress code Tuesday night in Los Angeles was a little more loose than at the real Oscars, ranging from formal to business casual -- to Zuckerberg casual. The host, actor and comedian Jonah Ray, joked about being forced to buy a suit at Target for the show before quipping, "It's still nicer than some of the cargo shorts I've seen tonight."
